mapper.select: SELECT attachment_id AS attachmentId, attachment_url AS attachmentUrl, attachment_name AS attachmentName, attachment_extension AS attachmentExtension, attachment_size AS attachmentSize, attachment_type AS attachmentType, attachment_created_at AS attachmentCreatedAt, attachment_updated_at AS attachmentUpdatedAt, attachment_writer_id AS attachmentWriterId, attachment_modifier_id AS attachmentModifierId FROM soma.soma_attachment WHERE attachment_id = #{attachmentId} ORDER BY attachment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soma.soma_attachment ( attachment_url, attachment_name, attachment_extension, attachment_size, attachment_type, attachment_writer_id, attachment_modifier_id, attachment_created_at, attachment_updated_at ) VALUES ( #{attachmentUrl}, #{attachmentName}, #{attachmentExtension}, #{attachmentSize}, #{attachmentType}, #{attachmentWriterId}, #{attachmentWriterId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
